channel.title: [317] Insanity-Allstar [317]
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Hey, I'm here to put a development team together for a Blank Allstar source. My expectations are not high, all you have to know how to do is code Emote teleport tabs, and how to add objects and npc's in the game, i can some what handle the rest, but if you are really good at something let me know what it is. Im not picky as long as my expectations are met wich i just listed above. i don't set them very high. In order to do this you must be intrested in all-star, i just can't get away from the classic stuff.. anyway if you wanna join the team message me on here like this:
Email: Coding experience: What you prefer to code: Your name:
Well thats about it. As we make progress i will post a page on server development on our progress. so just message me, and i will get back to you. I might not do it quick, but i will respond ASAP due to the fact have school.[/size]

item.title: [317] Insanity-Allstar [317]
item.dc:creator: @Str_Pker_CODER Str Pker CODER
item.description:
@Str_Pker_CODER wrote:

Email:Donserb150@aim.com
Coding experience: i have had my allstar based servers coded from allstar v2
What you prefer to code: i like to code new areas, like train, home, skills, those type of things i want to learn how to code bigger and better things, and one thing that i do need help on is the emote tab making, how do i make it so they work,?
Your name: Str Pker - For ingame names
My Real name: my real name is marko bicanin and i always dreamed of haven the biggest and the most badass server since 4 years ago i believe., Thanks for reading, i might not look back at these forums just send me a pm, thats all thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Insanity-Allstar [317]
item.dc:creator: @InsanityAllstar InsanityAllstar
item.description:
@InsanityAllstar wrote:

[quote=“Encryption, post:4, topic:411823”][quote author=InsanityAllstar link=topic=513078.msg3724546#msg3724546 date=1314162669]

Okay, goodluck with your server. I could possibly help you. This may or, may not go anywhere.

Emote tabs, are meant for emotes. Not for teleports, thats what your magic book is for.
I don’t know what Allstar was thinking, dumbass.
No hate, but it was actually pretty popular back in the day.
[/quote]I totally get you, but im not use to mage book teles, and thats what all-star is all about Emote tab teles… Duhh :). i just want a team that knows allstars, sorda like i do… a little anyway haha

I used to deal with them back in the day, here’s one of the Un-finished projects I released.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

It’s been nearly 6 years dealing with java.[/quote]
Damn nice job, i wish i could do something like that, Hell i might just edit your haha!

Read full topic
